botMention.title: 👋 Hey there!
tips: 💡 Use `/level` to check your current level and XP progress!
📊 Use `/leaderboard` to see who's leading in XP on this server!
🚀 Send messages to gain XP and level up! (1 minute cooldown between XP gains)
🎯 Each level requires exponentially more XP - the grind gets real!
🏆 Reach levels 10, 20, 30, 40, or 50 to unlock special role rewards!
📈 Check your detailed progress with level bars and XP breakdowns!
⚡ Higher levels are prestigious achievements - show off your dedication!
🎮 Keep chatting and engaging with the community to climb the ranks!
🚀 Get the booster role for 2x XP and level up twice as fast!
